data.title: Just keeps getting better
data.text:
This is a real, local sports pub.  Dart boards everywhere, inside cornhole and more. Really good beer, a great bar staff and a kitchen that stays open until 2 during the week!  
It just has a great feel, a sports bar you can just hang at.  Twenty years ago this was our favorite place when we lived in Cary and it's still great. It's bigger and better, but still has that real sports bar unique feel.

data.title: Nice local hole in the wall
data.text: I prefer to give my money to places like this rather chains. It's a local dive hangout and the drinks are numerous and not typical. Lots of great shots of one off stuff. Pool Table, very good bar food and good service.

data.title: PBR on draft!
data.text: I was sad yesterday when PBR was out on tap, but that's okay.  We enjoyed their house specialty of a rum infused cherry coke.  I could drink my body weight in those!  The giant pretzels are really good as well as the cheeseburgers.  I'd stay away from the nachos because they get cold and soggy quickly.  Bar staff is awesome.
